com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util
Class BluetoothReflection

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util.BluetoothReflection

public class BluetoothReflection
extends Object

Provides access to Android Bluetooth classes via Java reflection.

Author:
lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)
